fields.description:
Test steps:
1. Run KS> Base UI> Tab Groups in Portrait mode - notice 6 Tabs
2. Rotate device to Landscape mode and back to Portrait

Actual result:
"Add/Remove Tab" disappears
Expected:
All Tabs should be on the screen
fields.summary: iOS7: Tab Groups - the Table View Row disappears with change of device orienation
